|brand = Acelink |model = BR-6774 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = AC |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AC2600 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = wireless router |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = TE7C2600 |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Qualcomm;IPQ8064; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = v7-A |cpu1spd = 1.4 GHz |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 128 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 256 |ram1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA8337; |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 4 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = <!-- Name;Version;Distro --> |stockos = <!-- Name;Version;Distro -->
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, USB 3.0 |exp_usb_num = 2 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 3 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = MU-MIMO |addchip = 2.4GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SE2623L;;4; ,,, 5GHz Power Amplifier IC;Skyworks;SKY85405;;4; |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac
|defaulip = 192.168.1.1 |defaultlogin = admin |defaultpass = admin |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = Edimax |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = No |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 05/29/2015 |estreldate = 01/05/2016 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9980; |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 4 |rad1rxchains = 4 |rad1sstreams = 4 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |nqam1 = 800 |rad1n = 600 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA9980; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac |rad2ac = 1733 |nqam2 = 800 |rad2n = 600 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== ===Features=== <small> * Comply 802.11a/b/g/n/ac standards with 4T4R in both 5GHz and 2.4GHz. * Supports 2.4GHz and 5GHZ wireless networks connection simultaneously. * Support 4T4R MIMO technology in 5GHz frequency and 4T4R MIMO technology :in 2.4GHz frequency, enhancing the performance and coverage range significantly. * Support 64/128-bit WEP, WPA and WPA2 securities and also 802.1x authentication. * High speed transmit and receive data rate - 1733Mbps while operating in 802.11ac :(5GHz, 80MHz) mode and 800Mbps while operating in 802.11an (2.4/5GHz) mode. * Supports WPS function for easy wireless association. * Supports USB3.0 and USB2.0 ports. </small>
===Specifications=== <small> *Product: 4T4R Concurrent Dual Band Gigabit Router *CPU: [[Qualcomm]] IPQ8064 @1.4GHz Dual Core Internet Processor *WLAN: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9980 (2.4GHz) + QCA9980 (5GHz) *MIMO Technology: 5GHz: 4T4R MIMO, 2.4GHz: 4T4R MIMO *Antenna: 4x 3dBi Dual Band external dipole antenna *Flash: 128MB NAND Flash *RAM: 256MB (2x) DDR3 SDRAM *Switch: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA8337 Gigabit Switch *Port: USB: 1x USB2.0, 1x USB3.0 :WAN: 1x GbE (10/100/1000Mbps) Auto-MDI/MDI-X UTP Port :LAN: 4x GbE (10/100/1000Mbps) Auto-MDI/MDI-X UTP Port *Power: 12V, 3A Switch Power Adapter *Dimension: 142mm x 235mm x 38mm (HxWxD) (enclosure only) </small>
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[http://www.smallnetbuilder.com/wireless/wireless-reviews/32871-tp-link-archer-c2600-ac-2600-wireless-dual-band-gigabit-router-reviewed ''TP-LINK Archer C2600 AC2600 Wireless Router'' on '''SmallNetBuilder'''] :*CPU: [[Qualcomm]] IPQ8064 @1.4GHz dual-core Internet Processor ::RAM: 512 MB (2x DDR3), Flash: 32 MB (SPI, SOIC 16-pin) :*2.4GHz Radio: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9980 4x4 MU-MIMO ::- [[Skyworks]] SE2623L 2.4GHz Power Amp (x4) :*5GHz Radio: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA9980 4x4 MU-MIMO ::- [[Skyworks]] SKY85405 5GHz Power Amp (x4) :*Switch: [[Qualcomm Atheros]] QCA8337 (4x GbE)
==See also== *[[List of 802.11ac Hardware]] *[[List of Four Stream Hardware]] *[[Acelink BR-6774AD]]
